product_name: REI Rain Spout Hat - Infant/Toddler Girls'
long_description: The REI Rain Spout hat fends off passing spring showers and provides summertime shade while your little one puddle-jumps or plays in the sun. Nylon shell features sealed seams at the crown for water resistance; mesh lining and sweat band add soft and dry comfort. Breakaway chin strap is adjustable.
short_description: The REI Rain Spout hat fends off passing spring showers and provides summertime shade while your little one puddle-jumps or plays in the sun.
